Posts.EditableText: Does this asl support any try/catch/exception handling?  If so how do I use them?
Posts.HTML: Does this asl support any try/catch/exception handling? If so how do I use them?

Posts.EditableText:
Unfortunately not. You need to check for error conditions yourself.

In most cases, functions will return null instead of giving an error.
Posts.HTML:
Unfortunately not. You need to check for error conditions yourself.

In most cases, functions will return null instead of giving an error.
